instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A2141 - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message:
hey guys,

got a A2141 16" here. I can install catalina over internet recovery, but nothing else over usb.

"update failed" at the end of the progress bar in the recovery

dfu restore no help...

internet recovery is on sonoma now. (cmd+option+r)


any ideas?

threads.title: A2141 - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message:
You shoud change security settings, before booting from USB.
Why need that, if you can install from Internet?

threads.title: A2141 - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message:
i know that...

i want to update the system. but not possible.

threads.title: A2141 - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message: catalina is going through. but no other system...

threads.title: A2141 - no update / fresh install / only catalina
A2141 - no update / fresh install / only catalina
threads.message:
Did you try to install Ventura from Internet?
What error did you get?
